pkgmetadata.longdescription: Scrape US Census Data // A scraper to collect US Census data from the American Community Survey (ACS) data and metadata. Available datasets include population, income, education and employment levels by age, sex and race. See http://mcdc.missouri.edu/websas/caps10acsb.html for more information. Unlike other census related packages, this package does not require a U.S. Census Bureau API.
